entry.title: 练习使用有道云笔记的markdown语法写作
entry.content: 一篇学习有道云笔记markdown语法的笔记 To Do List 已经完成1 已经完成2 待办 下级待办2 流程图hexo不支持，需要插件hexo-filter-flowchart，但语法稍有不同12graph TBA-->B 12graph RLA-->B 123456graph TBA[zzzz]-->B(sssss)B-->C{xxxxx}C-->|One| D[ccccc]C-->|Two| E{vvvv}C-->|three| F((lll)) 甘特图123456789101112131415gantt dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD title Adding GANTT diagram functionality to mermaid section A section Completed task :done, des1, 2014-01-06,2014-01-08 Active task :active, des2, 2014-01-09, 3d Future task : des3, after des2, 5d Future task2 : des4, after des3, 5d section Critical tasks Completed task in the critical line :crit, done, 2014-01-06,24h Implement parser and jison :crit, done, after des1, 2d Create tests for parser :crit, active, 3d Future task in critical line :crit, 5d Create tests for renderer :2d Add to mermaid :1d 表格 header 1 header 2 row 1 col 1 row 1 col 2 row 2 col 1 row 2 col 2 公式这种方式不支持 1E = mc^2 使用MathJax引擎（站点配置文件设置为true） $$x=\frac{-b\pm\sqrt{b^2-4ac}}{2a}$$ \(x=\frac{-b\pm\sqrt{b^2-4ac}}{2a}\) 或者直接加载文件 1<script type="text/javascript" src="https://cdn.mathjax.org/mathjax/latest/MathJax.js?config=default"></script> 序列图hexo不支持，需要插件hexo-filter-sequence，但语法稍有不同1234567891011sequenceDiagram participant Alice participant Bob Alice->John: Hello John, how are you? loop Healthcheck John->John: Fight against hypochondria end Note right of John: Rational thoughts <br/>prevail... John-->Alice: Great! John->Bob: How about you? Bob-->John: Jolly good! 代码高亮123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-import os # 数据库客户端编码import cx_Oracle # 连接数据库import json # json处理import codecs # 读取json文件需要编码# 或者os.environ['NLS_LANG'] = 'SIMPLIFIED CHINESE_CHINA.UTF8'os.environ['NLS_LANG'] = 'AMERICAN_AMERICA.AL32UTF8'# 有些utf-8文件有隐藏的BOM头，要将BOM头去掉# 对文件制定特定的UTF-8编码with codecs.open('HKSCS2016.json', 'r', 'utf-8') as f: data = json.load(f)print(len(data))# connect oracle databasedb = cx_Oracle.connect('sjtest/sjtest@127.0.0.1:1521/orcl')# create cursorcursor = db.cursor()for kk in range(len(data)): sqlStr = "insert into TEST_HKSCS2016 values(" +"'"+data[kk]['codepoint']+"'"+", "+"'"+data[kk]['char']+"'"+", "+"'"+str(data[kk]['hkscs-ver'])+"'"+", "+"'"+data[kk]['cangjie']+"'"+", "+"'"+data[kk]['cantonese']+"'"+", "+"'"+data[kk]['H-Source']+"'"+")" cursor.execute(sqlStr)db.commit()# close cursor and oraclef.close()cursor.close()db.close() 无序列表 aaa bbb ccc 有序列表 aa bb cc 粗体和斜体这是斜体 这是粗体 插入链接有道官网 插入图片 分割线第一段 第二段

entry.title: 一部不错的医务剧
entry.content: 《良医》又名《好医生》 《良医》这部医务剧最近看的《良医》感觉真的不错，而且我对于医疗类型的剧开始感兴趣了，我看到第五集，主演的演技算很成熟的，特别是第五集最后那段，最后那段配上舒缓的音乐让人怎能不感动。 随便放点音乐 随便放点视频 Your user agent does not support the HTML5 Video element.

entry.title: 第一次使用hexo
entry.content: 第一次使用hexo，记录下常用命令： 安装Hexo： npm install hexo-cli -g 查看版本： hexo -v 初始化Hexo： hexo init 安装组件：npm install 安装与github交互的扩展：npm install hexo-deployer-git –save 新建一篇博客：hexo new post “article title” 本地部署：hexo s -g 发布部署：hexo d -g 更换主题：git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next 主题文档： http://theme-next.iissnan.com/getting-started.html 添加sitemap和feed插件：npm install hexo-generator-feed -savenpm install hexo-generator-sitemap -save 关于getDrawDataIndex为null的错误：路径：Blog\node_modules\hexo-helper-live2d\dist\bundle.js在第一个getDrawDataIndex(t)的前面一个function里加一个判断：if(this.live2DModel === null)return!1;

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
